select order_create_at, order_id, pay_total, order_status, pg_trade_no from sp_order where (order_status='S' or order_status='R' or order_status='D' or order_status='J' or order_status='PS')
and order_create_at >= #{startTime} ::timestamp
and order_create_at <= #{endTime} ::timestamp
union select r.create_at as order_create_at, r.order_id, r.pay_back_fee as pay_total, r.refund_type as order_status, r.pg_trade_no from sp_refund r, sp_order o where r.order_id=o.order_id and o.order_status='T'
and create_at >= #{startTime} ::timestamp
and create_at <= #{endTime} ::timestamp
ORDER BY order_create_at DESC
LIMIT ALL OFFSET 0
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

select to_char(order_create_at, 'yyyy-mm-dd') as sort, sum(ol1.succ_amount) as pay_method, sum(pay_total) as pay_total, sum(ol2.return_amount) as order_type from sp_order o LEFT JOIN (select order_id, sum(amount) as succ_amount from sp_order_line group by order_id) ol1 on ol1.order_id=o.order_id and (o.order_status='S' or o.order_status='R' or o.order_status='D' or o.order_status='J' or o.order_status='PS') LEFT JOIN (select order_id, sum(amount) as return_amount from sp_order_line group by order_id) ol2 on ol2.order_id=o.order_id and o.order_status='T' where (o.order_status='S' or o.order_status='R' or o.order_status='D' or o.order_status='J' or o.order_status='PS' or o.order_status='T')
and order_create_at >= #{startTime} ::timestamp
and order_create_at <= #{endTime} ::timestamp
GROUP BY sort ORDER BY sort DESC
LIMIT ALL OFFSET 0
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}

select ROW_NUMBER() OVER() as line_id, sku_id, sku_title, sku_color, sku_size, sum(pay_total) price, sum(amount) amount, sum((select amount from sp_order o, sp_order_line l where o.order_id=l.order_id and order_status='T')) as item_id from sp_order_line l, sp_order o where l.order_id=o.order_id and (order_status='S' or order_status='R' or order_status='D' or order_status='J' or order_status='PS')
and order_create_at >= #{startTime} ::timestamp
and order_create_at <= #{endTime} ::timestamp
GROUP BY sku_id, sku_title, sku_color, sku_size ORDER BY amount DESC
LIMIT ALL OFFSET 0
LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
